outputs.output_descr:
The preparation of an HCFC Phase-out Management Plan (HPMP) for Angola, through freeze on production and consumption of HCFCs from 01 January 2013, at the Baseline Levels (average of 2009 and 2010). 

The second control step is the reduction of 10% from the Baseline Levels.

The preparation of an HCFC Phase-out Management Plan (HPMP) for Angola, through freeze on production and consumption of HCFCs from 01 January 2013, at the Baseline Levels (average of 2009 and 2010). 

The second control step is the reduction of 10% from the Baseline Levels.

project_descr: The document describes the proposed institutional arrangements and budgets for preparation of HCFC Phase-out Management Plan (HPMP) for Angola.
